name: Legendaria: Night of the Living Dead
name_original: Legendaria: Night of the Living Dead
description:
A story that takes place in the world of Lexon...

Fight monsters, buy items, and survive the horde! Each wave, more skeletons try to eat you alive. Only by using your own skills and wits can you survive this nightmare...

~ Survive for as long as you can
~ Buy items by killing more skeletons
~ Compete against others with the online leaderboard
